name: buggyblog
description: APIs, or Application Programming Interfaces, allow different software systems to communicate with each other. I have created a simple Blogging API that allows users to authenticate, create blog posts, get all blog posts, and get a particular blog post. I have also implemented routes that allows users to signup for a blogging account, and log into their accounts.
